contentrichtext.text: {{Annotated image | image = Sur1.gif | image-width = 718 <!-- choose a big image --> | image-left = -180 <!-- crop the left part --> | image-top = -1000 <!-- crop the upper part --> | width = 380 <!-- crop the right part --> | height = 390 <!-- crop the below part --> | image-bg-color = #8080c0; | annot-font-size = 18 | annot-background-color = white | annot-color = red | float = right | annotations= | caption = '''Queen Adelaide Archipelago''' (Spanish: Archipiélago Reina Adelaida) }} '''Queen Adelaide Archipelago''' ({{lang-es|Archipiélago Reina Adelaida}}) is an island group in [[Zona Austral]], the extreme south of [[Chile]]. It belongs to the [[Magallanes y la Antártica Chilena Region]]. The major islands in the group are [[Pacheco Island]], [[Contreras Island]], [[Ramirez Island]], [[Cochrane Island]], [[Juan Guillermos Island]] and the [[Rennell Islands]] ([[South Rennell Island]] and [[North Rennell Island]]). {{coord|52.1667|S|74.6667|W|source:kolossus-frwiki|display=title}} [[Category:Archipelagoes of Chile]] [[Category:Queen Adelaide Archipelago]] {{MagellanAntarctic-geo-stub}}
